job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Title
- Machine Learning Engineer
Type
- Fulltime
Location
- San Francisco, California, United States
We are seeking a Machine Learning Software Engineer to become an integral part of our team! You will be responsible for creating and modifying software or specialized programs.
Responsibilities:
Analyze user needs and develop software solutions
Work with project manager or product owner to meet specification needs
Recommend software upgrades to optimize operational efficiency
Collaborate with other developers to design and optimize code
Document all programming tasks and procedures
Perform routine software maintenance
Qualifications:
Previous experience in software development, computer engineering, or other related fields
3+ years working experience with:
Python applied to SaaS/Enterprise Data-pipeline/classification projects
Relational database technologies: Postgres/SQL Alchemy (preferably thru AWS-RDS)
Text/document processing & machine learning technologies: NLP, Tensor Flow/PyTorch, Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN), Computational linguistics experience, Clustering, Decision tree learning and their real-world advantages/drawbacks.
Document processing: Document format Conversion, meta-data Extraction, content Classification, & content Summarization
Agile software development: JIRA (SCRUM, PR/Code reviews, unit tests)
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science/related discipline, or equivalent work experience
Bonus points for commercial experience working on any of the following:
Search ranking, relevance and optimization: Elasticsearch
Containerization + Container Orchestration
Workflow scalable infrastructure: Celery/RabbitMQ, Airflow
DevOps via AWS: AWS Sagemaker, AWS-ECS, AWS-EKS, CloudWatch
NoSQL: Any document-oriented database
Continuous integration, Automated testing
